long_description: Offering enhanced traction in winter conditions, the Kako ICEtrekkers Chains Traction System acts like tire chains for your feet. Case-hardened steel links bite into snow for exceptional grip in all directions; suitable for all snow conditions including packed and crusty surfaces. Rubber shoe harness secures easily and ensures a snug, responsive fit even in frigid conditions; rubber remains flexible in subzero temps. The compact size of the Kako ICEtrekkers Chains Traction System takes up little space in a pack, car or emergency kit.
short_description: Offering enhanced traction in winter conditions, the Kako ICEtrekkers Chains Traction System acts like tire chains for your feet.
